places.formattedAddress: 1, New Park Square, Edinburgh Park, Edinburgh EH12 9GR, UK

editorialSummary.text: Game4Padel is Edinburgh's premier padel tennis facility featuring 4 state-of-the-art indoor courts with professional-grade glass walls and LED lighting. The venue offers a welcoming atmosphere for players of all levels, from complete beginners to seasoned professionals.

text.text: Brilliant venue! The courts are well-maintained and the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. The booking system is straightforward and the changing facilities are spotless. Perfect for a quick game after work.

originalText.text: Brilliant venue! The courts are well-maintained and the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. The booking system is straightforward and the changing facilities are spotless. Perfect for a quick game after work.

text.text: Love this place. Perfect facilities for both beginners and experienced players. The heated courts are a real bonus during Edinburgh's winter months. Only downside is it can get busy at peak times, so book ahead.

originalText.text: Love this place. Perfect facilities for both beginners and experienced players. The heated courts are a real bonus during Edinburgh's winter months. Only downside is it can get busy at peak times, so book ahead.

text.text: Excellent padel facility with modern equipment and great lighting. The pro shop has everything you need if you forget your racket. Good parking available and easy to find in Edinburgh Park. Highly recommend for anyone looking to try padel.

originalText.text: Excellent padel facility with modern equipment and great lighting. The pro shop has everything you need if you forget your racket. Good parking available and easy to find in Edinburgh Park. Highly recommend for anyone looking to try padel.

text.text: Great venue for padel with well-maintained courts. The coaching sessions are excellent for improving your game. Cafe area is decent for a post-match coffee. Would give 5 stars but membership prices are a bit steep.

originalText.text: Great venue for padel with well-maintained courts. The coaching sessions are excellent for improving your game. Cafe area is decent for a post-match coffee. Would give 5 stars but membership prices are a bit steep.

text.text: As someone new to padel, I found this venue incredibly welcoming. The staff took time to explain the rules and recommend the right equipment. Courts are professional standard and the whole place has a friendly community feel.

originalText.text: As someone new to padel, I found this venue incredibly welcoming. The staff took time to explain the rules and recommend the right equipment. Courts are professional standard and the whole place has a friendly community feel.
